name: Light (itch) (WafflePixel)
description:
This game is finally fully released, what are you waiting for, download the game for free or you can support me by donating.

This game is about adventure of a young that doesn't know anything at all he kinda lost he's memory so he go to the town where he spending his childhood on there but instade of getting his memory back, he make and found new memory that he can't even forget it. If you are interested download the game and play it by yourself it's free

if you have any question contact me via email > lolipopfaiz0@gmail.com

if there are some bug, glitch, error, or even the game is unplayable for some reason contact me, so i can immediately fix the problem

Thx for visiting my page, you can visit my youtube channel here >https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqEZ2CF-m81lPNhxzQJUP4w
